title: Miracles of Prophet Mohamed

Our Prophet (saas) fulfilled the great responsibility he was given in the best way possible, summoned people to AllahÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s path and became the one who guided all believers to AllahÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s path. Our purpose in this book is to remind people of some of the miracles Allah granted to our blessed Prophet (saas) He made exemplary to all people with his superior morality, profound faith and all his manners and words.
